maps:
OSM: Mapnik new OpenLayers.Layer.OSM( "Open Street Map") 100 true World true
Google Street Map new OpenLayers.Layer.Google("Google Street Map", {'sphericalMercator': true}) 110 true World true
Google Hybrid new OpenLayers.Layer.Google("Google Hybrid", {'type': G_HYBRID_MAP, 'numZoomLevels':20, 'sphericalMercator': true} ) 1 true World true
Google Terrain new OpenLayers.Layer.Google("Google Terrain", {'type': G_PHYSICAL_MAP, 'sphericalMercator': true} ) 1 true World true var globe
No Map globe 7 true World true
